opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
, AND NOW, this 10th day of April, 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED and the Application for Supersedeas is DISMISSED AS MOOT.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
